title: Roglič Time Penalty Adds Twist to Vuelta’s Tight GC Battle with 1 Week to Go
content:
After Sunday's climbing chaos, it's still impossible to say who will win the Vuelta and who will step onto the final podium September 8 in Madrid.

Read the full article at Roglič Time Penalty Adds Twist to Vuelta’s Tight GC Battle with 1 Week to Go on Velo.
author: ahood
